name: Sonic In Ocean Valley
description:
Sonic In Ocean Valley

Date:August 14th,2017

Here is The Link and There is two version to play this game

Flash Player Version:https://flowlab.io/game/play/701416

Html5 Version:https://flowlab.io/game/play/701416?v=html

       

                                                                         Story/Plot

After Sonic Beat Dr.Robotnik And Get All The Chaos Emeralds.Dr.Robotnik Retired His Job To Make A New Villains To Take Over His Job.Sonic Was On His Next Adventure All Alone Without Tails And Knuckles Alone At Green Hill Zone And Sonic Meet Dash That is A Light Fox With One Tail. Sonic And Dash Will Go On Fun Adventure.

                                                                 Control

                                                     Arrow Keys To Move

                                                          Z or X To Jump

                                         Spacebar To Change Character
